title: vairAgyam taruvAi
sahitya:
vairAgyam taruvAi citta vairAgyam taruvAi


anupallavi

  dhairyamAga mana vairiyai venrALum


caraNam 1    sAkSi nilaiyinilum kATSi nilaiyinilum saha viLaiyADalin sUkSi nilaiyinilum
ATSi sheidd-anaittaiyum aintozhil naDattiDum appanE nI enuT-ceppiyapaDi sheyya
    caraNam 2    nAn enum Anavam nANi vaNangiDa nAnA vikAramati tAn unakkiNangiDa
En ennum eduvenrum engengum illAmal irundapaDi irundu porundi unnuDan vAzhum
    caraNam 3    vanjak-kavalai viTTut-tanjam pughundu manam vAkkilum sheyalilum vaittunnai nEsittu
nenjak-kiLi eppOdum anjezhutt-OdiyE nimmatiyAghiya nittiyAnandam pera
